parameters.query:
-- EstadÃ­sticas generales
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab.usuarios) as total_usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab.usuarios WHERE "Activo" = TRUE) as usuarios_activos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab."Consultas") as total_consultas,
  (SELECT COALESCE(SUM("Costo"), 0) FROM nutridiab."Consultas") as costo_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab."Consultas" WHERE created_at >= CURRENT_DATE) as consultas_hoy,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab.usuarios WHERE created_at >= CURRENT_DATE) as usuarios_hoy,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab."Consultas" WHERE tipo = 'texto') as consultas_texto,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab."Consultas" WHERE tipo = 'imagen') as consultas_imagen,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutridiab."Consultas" WHERE tipo = 'audio') as consultas_audio;
